data_description.segDschId: Voyage stop of incoming (previous) discharge leg
data_description.origNextSegLoadId: Original voyage stop of next loading leg
data_description.origNextSegDschId: Original discharge port (format: <ServiceID>-<VesselName>-<VoyageNumber>-<Direction>-<DischargePortCode><DockNumber>-<Number>). You should perform substring search for port code.
data_description.tgtNextSegLoadId: Target voyage stop of next loading leg (format: <ServiceID>-<VesselName>-<VoyageNumber>-<Direction>-<DischargePortCode><DockNumber>-<Number>). You should perform substring search for port code.
data_description.tgtNextSegDschId: Target discharge port (format: <ServiceID>-<VesselName>-<VoyageNumber>-<Direction>-<DischargePortCode><DockNumber>-<Number>). You should perform substring search for port code.
data_description.incBerthDepTm: Target (Potential) next loading leg berth arrival time (Target connection arrival time)
data_description.conBerthArrTm: Original next loading leg berth arrival time (Original connection arrival time)
data_description.conBerthDepTm: Original next loading leg berth departure time (Original connection departure time)
